overview: This live concert was recorded at Sant Cugat del Vallès, Barcelona, in January 2007. The band: Kevin McCormick, Javier Mas, Charlie Cepeda, Raul Rodriguez, Jimmy Gonzalez, Álvaro Gandúl, Alex Bublitchi, Jabier Muguruza, Mireia Otzerinjauregi, Perla Batalla. Musical directors: Kevin McCormick and Javier Mas. Artistic director: Alberto Manzano.
title: According to Leonard Cohen
